content: I think we had a brief discussion about this before but details can't recall. But when we do tweet, especially for help, couldn't we tag Drupal? We get more help, and more exposure.

I do most of the Tweeting and I don't remember this discussion. But, it does make sense. I have been trying to use #hashtags more, but I often (usually) forget. I'll try to use the #Drupal hashtag more often.
